title: Nametate☆Apple Pie
original_name: なめたて ☆ あっぷるぱい
sinopse:
The slapstick adult comedy follows Kaito, a "tongue-therapy master" who uses his profession to correct women's posture and leave them with beautiful skin. One day, Kaito encounters his childhood crush who is in need of his services.

(Source: ANN)
